keyMoments.title: Continues Training After Sabo's Death
keyMoments.description: Luffy intensifies his training with Ace after Sabo's apparent death, fighting daily to become stronger.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's determination to honor Sabo's memory and his commitment to becoming a great pirate.

keyMoments.title: Vows to Become Stronger
keyMoments.description: Luffy tearfully expresses his desire to become stronger to protect those he loves, leading Ace to promise he won't die.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Luffy's core motivation and foreshadows his future growth after Ace's death.

keyMoments.title: Departs from Goa Kingdom
keyMoments.description: After ten years of waiting, seventeen-year-old Luffy finally departs from Windmill Village to begin his journey to become King of the Pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Luffy's journey that leads to Episode 1, showing his departure from his perspective.
keyMoments.quote: I'm going to be King of the Pirates!

keyMoments.title: Defeats the Lord of the Coast
keyMoments.description: Luffy easily defeats the Sea King that took Shanks' arm using his Gomu Gomu no Pistol technique.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's growth and readiness to begin his journey, properly animated for the first time.

keyMoments.title: Expresses Grief and Self-Doubt
keyMoments.description: In the present timeline, Luffy tells Jinbe he's too weak to become Pirate King, showing his despair over losing Ace.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the devastating impact of Ace's death and sets up Luffy's eventual recovery and two-year training.
keyMoments.quote: I'm too weak... I can't be the Pirate King.

abilities.description: Luffy uses his Devil Fruit power to defeat the Lord of the Coast, demonstrating his growth and mastery.

relationships.description: Luffy trains with Ace and grows stronger together. Their bond deepens as Ace becomes more protective.

evolutionMoments.description: After Sabo's death, Ace and Luffy continue training together and Ace promises not to die.

reveals.information: Luffy has grown strong enough to easily defeat the Lord of the Coast
In present day, Luffy is overwhelmed by grief and self-doubt after losing Ace

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Continues Training After Sabo's Death
keyMoments.description: Ace intensifies his training with Luffy after Sabo's apparent death, working to become stronger.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ace's determination and his grief over losing Sabo.

keyMoments.title: Protects Luffy from Bear
keyMoments.description: Ace saves Luffy from a bear attack, becoming more protective of his younger brother.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ace's protective nature, foreshadowing his ultimate sacrifice.

keyMoments.title: Promises Not to Die
keyMoments.description: Ace promises Luffy that he won't die because he has a weak little brother to take care of.
keyMoments.significance: This promise becomes tragically ironic given Ace's death at Marineford protecting Luffy.
keyMoments.quote: I won't die. I have a weak little brother to take care of.

keyMoments.title: Departs from Goa Kingdom
keyMoments.description: At age seventeen, Ace departs from Goa Kingdom to begin his journey as a pirate.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Ace's pirate career that leads to joining the Whitebeard Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Leaves Message for Dadan
keyMoments.description: Ace leaves Dadan a simple message of 'Thank you' before departing, causing her to break down in tears.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Ace's gratitude and the impact he had on those who raised him.

relationships.description: Ace becomes increasingly protective of Luffy and makes a promise not to die.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace saves Luffy from a bear and promises not to die, showing his protective nature.

relationships.description: Despite their rough relationship, Ace shows gratitude to Dadan who raised him.

evolutionMoments.description: Ace leaves Dadan a message of thanks before departing, revealing his appreciation.

reveals.information: Ace departs from Goa Kingdom at age 17 to begin his pirate journey
Ace promises Luffy he won't die because he has a little brother to protect

keyMoments.title: Emotional Breakdown Over Ace's Departure
keyMoments.description: When informed of Ace's departure and his message of thanks, Dadan breaks down in tears despite her tough exterior.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Dadan's deep maternal love for the boys she raised, showing her true feelings beneath her rough persona.

relationships.description: Dadan raised Ace and despite her rough exterior, deeply cares for him as a mother would.

evolutionMoments.description: Dadan breaks down in tears when Ace leaves, revealing her maternal love.

relationships.description: Dadan raised Luffy and sees him off when he departs on his journey.

evolutionMoments.description: Dadan sees Luffy off as he departs from Windmill Village.

reveals.information: Despite her tough exterior, Dadan has deep maternal feelings for Ace and Luffy

name.japanese: モンキー・D・ドラゴン

keyMoments.title: Rescues Mysterious Person
keyMoments.description: Dragon returns to the Revolutionary Army ship carrying someone who needs urgent medical attention.
keyMoments.significance: Foreshadows the revelation that Sabo survived and was rescued by Dragon.

keyMoments.title: Mentions Baltigo
keyMoments.description: Dragon tells Ivankov he must depart for Baltigo due to attracting too much attention.
keyMoments.significance: First mention of Baltigo as the Revolutionary Army headquarters.

relationships.description: Dragon rescues Sabo from the ocean after his ship is destroyed by a Celestial Dragon.

evolutionMoments.description: Dragon is shown carrying the rescued person (later revealed to be Sabo) to his ship.

reveals.information: Dragon is heading to Baltigo, the Revolutionary Army headquarters
Dragon rescued someone (implied to be Sabo) who needs medical attention

name.japanese: エンポリオ・イワンコフ

keyMoments.title: Questions Dragon About Rescued Person
keyMoments.description: Ivankov questions Dragon about the person he rescued, witnessing the Revolutionary Army's urgency.
keyMoments.significance: Ivankov is present when Sabo is rescued, though the person's identity isn't revealed yet.

keyMoments.title: Rescued by Dragon (Identity Hidden)
keyMoments.description: Dragon returns to the Revolutionary Army ship carrying someone who needs urgent medical attention. The person's identity is not revealed, but later episodes confirm this is Sabo.
keyMoments.significance: This scene subtly reveals Sabo's survival without explicitly confirming it, creating a major foreshadowing moment.

relationships.description: Sabo is rescued by Dragon after his ship is destroyed, though this is not explicitly revealed in this episode.

evolutionMoments.description: Dragon rescues Sabo from the ocean (identity not yet revealed).

reveals.information: Sabo survived the Celestial Dragon attack and was rescued by Dragon (revealed through subtle foreshadowing)

keyMoments.title: Consoles Grieving Luffy
keyMoments.description: Jinbe listens to Luffy's expressions of grief and self-doubt in the present timeline.
keyMoments.significance: Jinbe serves as Luffy's emotional anchor during his darkest moment.

relationships.description: Jinbe supports Luffy during his grief over Ace's death.

evolutionMoments.description: Jinbe listens to Luffy's expressions of grief and despair.
